<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>AI Tribes Videos</title>
    <style>
        .video-container {
            position: relative;
            width: 100vw;
            height: 100vh;
            overflow: hidden;
            background: #000;
        }

        .video {
            position: absolute;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            object-fit: cover;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 3s ease-in-out;
        }

        .video.active {
            opacity: 1;
        }

        .title-overlay {
            position: absolute;
            top: 50%;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
            color: white;
            text-align: center;
            z-index: 10;
            opacity: 0;
            transition: opacity 1s ease-in-out, transform 1s ease-out;
        }

        .title-overlay.active {
            opacity: 1;
        }

        .main-title {
            font-size: 4rem;
            font-weight: bold;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            text-shadow: 
                0 0 10px rgba(0,255,255,0.5),
                0 0 20px rgba(0,255,255,0.4),
                0 0 30px rgba(0,255,255,0.3),
                0 0 40px rgba(0,255,255,0.2),
                0 0 50px rgba(0,255,255,0.1);
            letter-spacing: 2px;
            font-family: 'Courier New', monospace;
            animation: glow 1.5s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
            transform: perspective(500px) translateZ(0);
        }

        .subtitle {
            font-size: 2rem;
            opacity: 0.9;
            text-shadow: 
                0 0 10px rgba(0,255,255,0.4),
                0 0 20px rgba(0,255,255,0.3),
                0 0 30px rgba(0,255,255,0.2);
            font-family: 'Courier New', monospace;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            animation: glow 2s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
            animation-delay: 0.5s;
        }

        @keyframes glow {
            from {
                text-shadow: 
                    0 0 10px rgba(0,255,255,0.5),
                    0 0 20px rgba(0,255,255,0.4),
                    0 0 30px rgba(0,255,255,0.3),
                    0 0 40px rgba(0,255,255,0.2);
                transform: perspective(500px) translateZ(0);
            }
            to {
                text-shadow: 
                    0 0 20px rgba(0,255,255,0.6),
                    0 0 30px rgba(0,255,255,0.5),
                    0 0 40px rgba(0,255,255,0.4),
                    0 0 50px rgba(0,255,255,0.3),
                    0 0 60px rgba(0,255,255,0.2),
                    0 0 70px rgba(0,255,255,0.1);
                transform: perspective(500px) translateZ(20px);
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body style="margin: 0; padding: 0;">
    <div class="video-container">
        <video class="video active" muted playsinline autoplay>
            <source src="assets/heroimages/herovideo1.mp4" type="video/mp4">
        </video>
        <video class="video" muted playsinline autoplay>
            <source src="assets/heroimages/herovideo2.mp4" type="video/mp4">
        </video>
        <div class="title-overlay">
            <div class="main-title"></div>
            <div class="subtitle"></div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const videos = document.querySelectorAll('.video');
            console.log('Found videos:', videos.length);
            
            const titleOverlay = document.querySelector('.title-overlay');
            const mainTitle = document.querySelector('.main-title');
            const subtitle = document.querySelector('.subtitle');
            let currentIndex = 0;

            // Video titles and subtitles
            const titles = [
                {
                    main: "NEURALAI ($NAI)",
                    sub: "By CryptoVoyager"
                },
                {
                    main: "Particle Swarm Optimization",
                    sub: "Nature-Inspired Neural Network Training"
                },
                {
                    main: "Swarm Intelligence",
                    sub: "Collective Behavior Optimization"
                },
                {
                    main: "PSO Algorithm",
                    sub: "Multi-Agent Search Optimization"
                },
                {
                    main: "NEURALAI Architecture",
                    sub: "Self-Evolving Network Topology"
                },
                {
                    main: "$NAI Token Utility",
                    sub: "Powering Neural Network Training"
                },
                {
                    main: "CryptoVoyager Presents",
                    sub: "Revolutionary AI on Bitcoin SV"
                },
                {
                    main: "Particle Swarm Features",
                    sub: "Global & Local Search Optimization"
                },
                {
                    main: "Advanced PSO",
                    sub: "Dynamic Parameter Adaptation"
                },
                {
                    main: "NEURALAI ($NAI)",
                    sub: "The Future of Neural Networks"
                }
            ];

            function showTitle(index) {
                titleOverlay.classList.remove('active');
                setTimeout(() => {
                    mainTitle.textContent = titles[index].main;
                    subtitle.textContent = titles[index].sub;
                    titleOverlay.classList.add('active');
                }, 1000);
            }

            function playNextVideo() {
                videos[currentIndex].classList.remove('active');
                currentIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % videos.length;
                videos[currentIndex].currentTime = 0;
                videos[currentIndex].play();
                videos[currentIndex].classList.add('active');
                showTitle(currentIndex);
            }

            // Initialize first video
            videos[0].play().catch(e => console.log('Video play failed:', e));
            showTitle(0);

            // Add ended event listeners
            videos.forEach(video => {
                video.addEventListener('ended', playNextVideo);
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

# htdocs/.htaccess
AddType audio/mpeg mp3
AddType audio/mp4 m4a

# Handle JavaScript files
AddType application/javascript .js
AddType text/javascript .js

# Enable directory listing if needed
Options +Indexes

# Handle errors
ErrorDocument 404 /404.html

Sheet 1: Revenue Projections
A. Subscription Revenue
Monthly Breakdown (2024-2026)
Basic Plan ($10/mo)
- Users: Starting 1000, 25% MoM growth
- Revenue: $10 × Users
- Churn: 5% monthly
Pro Plan ($20/mo)
- Users: Starting 500, 20% MoM growth
- Revenue: $20 × Users
- Churn: 3% monthly
Enterprise Plan (Avg $5000/mo)
- Clients: Starting 2, adding 2-3 per quarter
- Revenue: $5000 × Clients
- Churn: 1% quarterly

Charts:
- User Growth by Plan Type (Line Chart)
- Revenue Distribution (Pie Chart)
- Monthly Revenue Growth (Bar Chart)

B. AI Development Services
Quarterly Revenue Targets
Custom AI Agents
- Basic Agents: $5K per implementation
- Advanced Agents: $20K per implementation
- Enterprise Solutions: $100K+ per project
Integration Services
- API Integration: $10K average
- Custom Development: $30K average
- Enterprise Integration: $150K average

Charts:
- Service Revenue Mix
- Project Pipeline
- Average Deal Size Trend

C. Token Economics Revenue
Token Metrics (Monthly)
Transaction Fees
- Expected Volume: Starting $1M, growing 30% MoM
- Fee Rate: 0.3%
Marketplace Fees
- Listed Agents: Growing 50% QoQ
- Average Price: $100
- Platform Fee: 5%
Staking Rewards
- Total Staked: 40% of supply
- APY: 12%

Charts:
- Token Revenue Streams
- Staking Growth
- Fee Revenue Growth

Sheet 2: Cost Structure
A. Development Costs
Team Costs (Monthly)
- Senior Engineers (3): $150K/year each
- AI Specialists (2): $180K/year each
- UI/UX Designer (1): $120K/year

Infrastructure (Monthly)
- AI Computing: $20K
- Cloud Services: $15K
- Development Tools: $5K

Charts:
- Cost Breakdown
- Team Growth
- Infrastructure Scaling

B. Marketing & Sales
Budget Allocation
- Digital Marketing: 30%
- Content Creation: 20%
- Community Building: 25%
- Events: 15%
- PR: 10%

Charts:
- Marketing ROI
- Customer Acquisition Cost
- Channel Performance

Sheet 3: Financial Statements
Quarterly Projections (2024-2026)
Revenue
- Q1 2024: $500K
- Q2 2024: $1M
- Q3 2024: $2M
- Q4 2024: $3.5M
2025: $33M
2026: $90M

Key Ratios
- Gross Margin: 75%
- Operating Margin: 25%
- R&D: 30% of revenue
- Marketing: 20% of revenue

Charts:
- Revenue Growth
- Margin Analysis
- Cash Flow Projection

Sheet 4: Key Metrics & Assumptions
Growth Assumptions
- User Growth: 25% MoM
- Revenue per User: $25 → $40
- Enterprise Clients: +2-3 per quarter
- Token Price: 2x yearly
- Market Share: 5% → 15% of TAM

Charts:
- KPI Dashboard
- Growth Metrics
- Market Penetration

File: /New/assets/docs/ai-tribes-roadmap.tex
================================================
\documentclass[11pt]{article}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{xcolor}
\usepackage{geometry}
\usepackage{hyperref}
\usepackage{fontawesome5}
\usepackage{titlesec}
\usepackage{fancyhdr}

% Define AI Tribes brand colors
\definecolor{primary}{HTML}{0D6EFD}
\definecolor{secondary}{HTML}{6C757D}
\definecolor{success}{HTML}{28A745}
\definecolor{info}{HTML}{17A2B8}

% Page geometry
\geometry{
    a4paper,
    top=2cm,
    bottom=2cm,
    left=2.5cm,
    right=2.5cm
}

% Header and footer
\pagestyle{fancy}
\fancyhead[L]{\includegraphics[height=1cm]{tribes_logo.png}}
\fancyhead[R]{Business Plan 2024}
\fancyfoot[C]{\thepage}

% Title formatting
\titleformat{\section}
{\color{primary}\Large\bfseries}
{\thesection}{1em}{}

\begin{document}

\begin{titlepage}
    \centering
    \vspace*{2cm}
    \includegraphics[width=0.6\textwidth]{tribes_logo.png}\\[2cm]
    {\Huge\bfseries AI Tribes Business Plan\\[0.5cm]}
    {\large\textcolor{secondary}{2024}}\\[2cm]
    
    \begin{abstract}
    Revolutionizing community management through AI-powered collaboration
    \end{abstract}
    
    \vfill
    
    {\large\textcolor{secondary}{
    \faGlobe\ www.aitribes.com\\
    \faEnvelope\ info@aitribes.com\\
    \faTwitter\ @aitribes\\
    \faDiscord\ discord.gg/aitribes
    }}
\end{titlepage}

\tableofcontents
\newpage

\section{Executive Summary}
AI Tribes is revolutionizing community management through AI-powered collaboration, enabling organizations to efficiently create, manage, and scale their communities using artificial intelligence.

\subsection{Key Metrics}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Total Addressable Market: \$5B
    \item Initial Funding Target: \$1.5M
    \item 3-Year Revenue Target: \$7.5M
\end{itemize}

\section{Company Overview}

\subsection{Mission}
To empower communities worldwide with AI-driven tools that enhance collaboration, creativity, and growth.

\subsection{Vision}
Building the future of community management where AI and human creativity work seamlessly together.

\subsection{Core Values}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Innovation in AI Technology
    \item Community-First Approach
    \item Transparent Operations
    \item Sustainable Growth
    \item Global Collaboration
\end{itemize}

\section{Market Analysis}

\subsection{Market Size}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Global DAO Market: \$10.4B
    \item AI Software Market: \$196B
    \item Community Management: \$1.6B
    \item Serviceable Market: \$5B
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Target Markets}
\subsubsection{Primary Markets}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Crypto/Web3 Projects
    \item Decentralized Autonomous Organizations
    \item Tech Startups
    \item Online Communities
\end{itemize}

\subsubsection{Secondary Markets}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Educational Institutions
    \item Research Groups
    \item Gaming Communities
    \item Content Creators
\end{itemize}

\section{Product \& Services}

\subsection{Core Platform Features}

\subsubsection{AI Agent Creation \& Management}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Customizable AI personalities
    \item Role-based capabilities
    \item Integration with major LLM providers
    \item Automated task management
\end{itemize}

\subsubsection{Token Launch Platform}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Multi-chain support
    \item Token economics tools
    \item Distribution management
    \item Staking mechanisms
\end{itemize}

\section{Business Model}

\subsection{Revenue Streams}
\subsubsection{Subscription Plans}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Basic: \$10/month
    \begin{itemize}
        \item 3 AI agents
        \item Basic analytics
        \item Community tools
    \end{itemize}
    \item Pro: \$20/month
    \begin{itemize}
        \item 10 AI agents
        \item Advanced analytics
        \item Priority support
    \end{itemize}
    \item Enterprise: Custom pricing
    \begin{itemize}
        \item Unlimited agents
        \item Custom features
        \item Dedicated support
    \end{itemize}
\end{itemize}

\section{Financial Projections}

\subsection{Revenue Forecast}
\begin{center}
\begin{tabular}{|l|r|r|r|r|r|}
\hline
Year & Q1 & Q2 & Q3 & Q4 & Total \\
\hline
2024 & \$50K & \$100K & \$150K & \$200K & \$500K \\
2025 & \$400K & \$450K & \$500K & \$650K & \$2M \\
2026 & \$1M & \$1.2M & \$1.3M & \$1.5M & \$5M \\
\hline
\end{tabular}
\end{center}

\subsection{Cost Structure}
\subsubsection{Fixed Costs (Annual)}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Development: \$600K
    \item Marketing: \$300K
    \item Operations: \$200K
    \item Infrastructure: \$100K
\end{itemize}

\section{Implementation Timeline}

\subsection{Phase 1: Foundation (Months 1-3)}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Core platform development
    \item Basic AI functionality
    \item MVP launch
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Phase 2: Growth (Months 4-6)}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Advanced features
    \item Marketing campaign
    \item Partnership development
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Phase 3: Scaling (Months 7-12)}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Enterprise features
    \item Geographic expansion
    \item Advanced analytics
\end{itemize}

\section{Success Metrics}

\subsection{Key Performance Indicators}
\begin{itemize}
    \item Monthly Active Tribes
    \item AI Agent Usage
    \item Token Transactions
    \item MRR Growth
    \item Customer LTV
    \item Churn Rate
\end{itemize}

\end{document}

File: /New/assets/docs/business-plan.html
================================================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>AI Tribes Business Plan 2024</title>
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0-alpha1/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.5.1/css/all.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        @media print {
            @page {
                size: A4;
                margin: 2cm;
            }
            body {
                -webkit-print-color-adjust: exact !important;
                print-color-adjust: exact !important;
            }
            .page-break {
                page-break-before: always;
            }
        }

        body {
            padding: 40px;
            color: #333;
        }

        .logo {
            max-width: 200px;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }

        .section {
            margin-bottom: 3rem;
        }

        .metric-card {
            background: #f8f9fa;
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            border: 1px solid #dee2e6;
        }

        .table-financial {
            width: 100%;
            margin: 2rem 0;
            border-collapse: collapse;
        }

        .table-financial th,
        .table-financial td {
            padding: 12px;
            border: 1px solid #dee2e6;
        }

        .icon-circle {
            width: 48px;
            height: 48px;
            background: #e9ecef;
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }

        .feature-list {
            list-style: none;
            padding-left: 0;
        }

        .feature-list li {
            padding: 0.5rem 0;
            padding-left: 1.5rem;
            position: relative;
        }

        .feature-list li:before {
            content: '→';
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            color: #0d6efd;
        }

        h1, h2, h3 {
            color: #0d6efd;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }

    <!-- Executive Summary -->
    <div class="page-break section" id="executive-summary">
        <h2>Executive Summary</h2>
        <div class="metric-card mb-4">
            <p class="lead">AI Tribes is pioneering the convergence of three transformative technologies: SaaS platforms ($195B), artificial intelligence ($196B), and cryptocurrency ($3T). We're creating the first autonomous software development platform that combines AI-powered development with crypto-economic incentives.</p>
            <p>By 2030, autonomous AI corporations are projected to manage over $10T in assets, with SaaS platforms alone reaching $900B by 2025. AI Tribes is positioned to become a foundational platform in this new paradigm, enabling the creation of self-sustaining, AI-driven software businesses backed by crypto economics.</p>
            <p>Our platform enables these tribes to automate their community management, enhance engagement, and create value through AI-driven tools and token economics. With the crypto market projected to reach $10T by 2025 and $100T by 2035, AI Tribes is perfectly positioned to become the backbone of Web3 community management.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="metric-card mb-4">
            <h3>The Rise of Autonomous Software Corporations</h3>
            <div class="row g-4">
                <div class="col-md-4">
                    <div class="text-center">
                        <h4>SaaS Market</h4>
                        <p class="display-6">$900B</p>
                        <p class="text-muted">by 2025</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-4">
                    <div class="text-center">
                        <h4>AI Development</h4>
                        <p class="display-6">$407B</p>
                        <p class="text-muted">by 2025</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-4">
                    <div class="text-center">
                        <h4>Autonomous Corps</h4>
                        <p class="display-6">$10T</p>
                        <p class="text-muted">by 2030</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

    <!-- Market Analysis -->
    <div class="page-break section" id="market-analysis">
        <h2>Market Analysis</h2>
        <div class="metric-card mb-4">
            <h3>The Future of Software Development</h3>
            <p>We are witnessing the convergence of three revolutionary trends:</p>
            <ul class="feature-list">
                <li>SaaS platforms are becoming the standard for software delivery, with 99% of organizations using at least one SaaS solution</li>
                <li>AI is transforming software development, with 77% of organizations either using or exploring AI-powered development tools</li>
                <li>Blockchain technology is enabling new business models, with autonomous organizations managing over $25B in assets</li>
            </ul>
            <p class="mt-3">This convergence is creating a new paradigm: AI-driven, token-powered software development platforms that can autonomously create, manage, and monetize software products.</p>
        </div>

        <div class="metric-card mb-4">
            <h3>Market Size Breakdown</h3>
            <table class="table table-financial">
                <tr>
                    <th>Segment</th>
                    <th>Size</th>
                    <th>Growth Rate</th>
                    <th>2025 Projection</th>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>Global SaaS Market</td>
                    <td>$195B</td>
                    <td>+35% YoY</td>
                    <td>$900B</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>AI Software Market</td>
                    <td>$196B</td>
                    <td>+38% YoY</td>
                    <td>$407B</td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                    <td>Global Crypto Market</td>
                    <td>$3T</td>
                    <td>+233% YoY</td>
                    <td>$10T</td>
                </tr>
            </table>
        </div>

        <div class="metric-card mb-4">
            <h3>Autonomous Corporation Potential</h3>
            <p>By 2030, autonomous AI corporations are projected to:</p>
            <ul class="feature-list">
                <li>Generate $5T in annual revenue</li>
                <li>Manage $10T in assets</li>
                <li>Create software worth $2T annually</li>
                <li>Employ millions of AI agents</li>
            </ul>
            <p class="mt-3">AI Tribes is building the infrastructure to enable this transition, combining:</p>
            <ul class="feature-list">
                <li>AI-powered software development automation</li>
                <li>Token-based governance and incentives</li>
                <li>Autonomous revenue generation and distribution</li>
                <li>Decentralized collaboration networks</li>
            </ul>
        </div>

        <div class="row g-4">
            <div class="col-md-6">
                <div class="metric-card">
                    <h3>Target Communities</h3>
                    <ul class="feature-list">
                        <li>Cryptocurrency Projects (>20,000 tokens)</li>
                        <li>DAOs (>4,000 active)</li>
                        <li>NFT Communities (>500 major collections)</li>
                        <li>DeFi Protocols (>200 major platforms)</li>
                        <li>Web3 Gaming Guilds (>1,000 active)</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-6">
                <div class="metric-card">
                    <h3>Market Drivers</h3>
                    <ul class="feature-list">
                        <li>Growing adoption of AI in community management</li>
                        <li>Increasing complexity of crypto communities</li>
                        <li>Rise of token-based governance</li>
                        <li>Demand for automated content creation</li>
                        <li>Need for scalable community management</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

================================================
File: /New/assets/js/wallet-connect.js
================================================
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // Load the wallet modal component
    fetch('/components/wallet-modal.html')
        .then(response => response.text())
        .then(html => {
            document.getElementById('walletModalContainer').innerHTML = html;
            walletModal = new bootstrap.Modal(document.getElementById('walletModal'));
            
            // Add event listeners for network filtering
            document.querySelectorAll('.btn-network-filter').forEach(btn => {
                btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const network = this.dataset.network;
                    filterWallets(network);
                });
            });
            
            // Add search functionality
            const searchInput = document.querySelector('.wallet-search input');
            if (searchInput) {
                searchInput.addEventListener('input', function(e) {
                    searchWallets(e.target.value);
                });
            }
        });
});

function openWalletModal() {
    if (walletModal) {
        walletModal.show();
    }
}

// Add search and filter functions
function searchWallets(query) {
    const wallets = document.querySelectorAll('.wallet-option');
    query = query.toLowerCase();
    
    wallets.forEach(wallet => {
        const name = wallet.querySelector('h6').textContent.toLowerCase();
        const desc = wallet.querySelector('p').textContent.toLowerCase();
        if (name.includes(query) || desc.includes(query)) {
            wallet.style.display = 'block';
        } else {
            wallet.style.display = 'none';
        }
    });
}

function filterWallets(network) {
    const wallets = document.querySelectorAll('.wallet-option');
    if (network === 'all') {
        wallets.forEach(wallet => wallet.style.display = 'block');
        return;
    }
    
    wallets.forEach(wallet => {
        const badge = wallet.querySelector('.badge:last-child');
        const walletNetwork = badge.textContent;
        if (walletNetwork.includes(network)) {
            wallet.style.display = 'block';
        } else {
            wallet.style.display = 'none';
        }
    });
}

async function connectPhantom() {
    try {
        if (!window.solana || !window.solana.isPhantom) {
            window.open('https://phantom.app/', '_blank');
            return;
        }
        
        const resp = await window.solana.connect();
        const address = resp.publicKey.toString();
        updateWalletUI(address);
        walletModal.hide();
    } catch (err) {
        console.error('Phantom connection error:', err);
    }
}

async function connectMetaMask() {
    try {
        if (!window.ethereum || !window.ethereum.isMetaMask) {
            window.open('https://metamask.io/download/', '_blank');
            return;
        }

        const accounts = await window.ethereum.request({ 
            method: 'eth_requestAccounts' 
        });
        updateWalletUI(accounts[0]);
        walletModal.hide();
    } catch (err) {
        console.error('MetaMask connection error:', err);
    }
}

async function connectBinanceWallet() {
    try {
        if (!window.BinanceChain) {
            window.open('https://www.bnbchain.org/en/wallet', '_blank');
            return;
        }

        const accounts = await window.BinanceChain.request({ 
            method: 'eth_requestAccounts' 
        });
        updateWalletUI(accounts[0]);
        walletModal.hide();
    } catch (err) {
        console.error('Binance Wallet connection error:', err);
    }
}

async function connectXverse() {
    try {
        if (!window.BitcoinProvider) {
            window.open('https://www.xverse.app/', '_blank');
            return;
        }

        const accounts = await window.BitcoinProvider.connect();
        updateWalletUI(accounts[0]);
        walletModal.hide();
    } catch (err) {
        console.error('Xverse connection error:', err);
    }
}

async function connectTrustWallet() {
    try {
        if (!window.trustwallet) {
            window.open('https://trustwallet.com/download', '_blank');
            return;
        }

        const accounts = await window.trustwallet.request({ 
            method: 'eth_requestAccounts' 
        });
        updateWalletUI(accounts[0]);
        walletModal.hide();
    } catch (err) {
        console.error('Trust Wallet connection error:', err);
    }
}

async function connectHandCash() {
    try {
        if (!window.handCash) {
            window.open('https://handcash.io/#download', '_blank');
            return;
        }

        const authToken = await window.handCash.connect();
        const account = await window.handCash.getProfile();
        updateWalletUI(account.handle);
        walletModal.hide();
    } catch (err) {
        console.error('HandCash connection error:', err);
    }
}

function updateWalletUI(account) {
    document.querySelectorAll('.wallet-connect-btn').forEach(btn => {
        // Format account string based on length
        const displayAccount = account.length > 20 
            ? `${account.substring(0, 6)}...${account.substring(account.length - 4)}`
            : account;

        btn.innerHTML = `
            <i class="fas fa-wallet me-2"></i>
            ${displayAccount}
        `;
        btn.classList.remove('btn-primary', 'btn-outline-primary');
        btn.classList.add('btn-success');
    });
}

// Add other wallet connection functions here

<div class="agent-analytics">
    <div class="row g-4">
        <!-- Performance Metrics -->
        <div class="col-md-6">
            <div class="card">
                <div class="card-header">
                    <h5 class="mb-0">Performance Over Time</h5>
                </div>
                <div class="card-body">
                    <canvas id="performanceChart"></canvas>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Task Distribution -->
        <div class="col-md-6">
            <div class="card">
                <div class="card-header">
                    <h5 class="mb-0">Task Distribution</h5>
                </div>
                <div class="card-body">
                    <canvas id="taskDistributionChart"></canvas>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script>
// Initialize charts using Chart.js
function initializeAnalytics() {
    const performanceCtx = document.getElementById('performanceChart').getContext('2d');
    const taskDistributionCtx = document.getElementById('taskDistributionChart').getContext('2d');

    // Performance chart
    new Chart(performanceCtx, {
        type: 'line',
        data: {
            labels: ['Week 1', 'Week 2', 'Week 3', 'Week 4'],
            datasets: [{
                label: 'Response Time (ms)',
                data: [1200, 1000, 800, 600],
                borderColor: '#0d6efd'
            }]
        }
    });

    // Task distribution chart
    new Chart(taskDistributionCtx, {
        type: 'doughnut',
        data: {
            labels: ['Moderation', 'Support', 'Content', 'Analysis'],
            datasets: [{
                data: [30, 25, 25, 20],
                backgroundColor: ['#0d6efd', '#20c997', '#ffc107', '#dc3545']
            }]
        }
    });
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initializeAnalytics);
</script>

<script>
// Initialize network graph
function initializeNetwork() {
    const ctx = document.getElementById('networkGraph').getContext('2d');
    const networkData = {
        nodes: [
            { id: 1, label: 'Community Manager', x: 100, y: 100 },
            { id: 2, label: 'Content Creator', x: 200, y: 150 },
            { id: 3, label: 'Analytics Agent', x: 150, y: 200 }
        ],
        edges: [
            { from: 1, to: 2 },
            { from: 2, to: 3 },
            { from: 3, to: 1 }
        ]
    };

    // Implement network visualization
    // (Using a library like vis.js or cytoscape.js would be better for this)
}

// Simulate real-time agent communication
function simulateAgentCommunication() {
    const messages = [
        { from: 'Community Manager', content: 'New member joined, initiating welcome sequence' },
        { from: 'Content Creator', content: 'Generated daily content summary' },
        { from: 'Analytics Agent', content: 'Engagement metrics updated' }
    ];

    const chatMessages = document.querySelector('.chat-messages');
    messages.forEach(msg => {
        const messageEl = document.createElement('div');
        messageEl.className = 'message p-2 mb-2 border rounded';
        messageEl.innerHTML = `
            <small class="text-primary">${msg.from}</small>
            <div>${msg.content}</div>
        `;
        chatMessages.appendChild(messageEl);
        chatMessages.scrollTop = chatMessages.scrollHeight;
    });
}

// Initialize everything
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    initializeNetwork();
    setInterval(simulateAgentCommunication, 5000);
});
</script>

<style>
.workflow-item {
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.workflow-item:hover {
    background: #f8f9fa;
    transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.message {
    animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease;
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
    from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(10px); }
    to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
}
</style>

                                            <h4 id="ethBalance">0.00</h4>

    <!-- Create Agent Modal -->
    <div class="modal fade" id="createAgentModal">
        <div class="modal-dialog">
            <div class="modal-content">
                <div class="modal-header">
                    <h5 class="modal-title">Create New AI Agent</h5>
                    <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal"></button>
                </div>
                <div class="modal-body">
                    <div class="mb-3">
                        <label class="form-label">Agent Name</label>
                        <input type="text" class="form-control" id="agentName">
                    </div>
                    <div class="mb-3">
                        <label class="form-label">Initial Funding</label>
                        <div class="input-group">
                            <input type="number" class="form-control" id="initialFunding">
                            <select class="form-select" id="fundingToken">
                                <option value="USDC">USDC</option>
                                <option value="ETH">ETH</option>
                                <option value="MATIC">MATIC</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="modal-footer">
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" onclick="submitCreateAgent()">Create Agent</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        // Initialize agent manager
        const agentManager = new AgentServiceManager();

        // Load agents
        async function loadAgents() {
            const agents = await agentManager.getAgents();
            const list = document.getElementById('agentList');
            
            list.innerHTML = agents.map(agent => `
                <a href="#" class="list-group-item list-group-item-action" 
                   onclick="selectAgent('${agent.id}')">
                    <div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                        <h6 class="mb-0">${agent.name}</h6>
                        <span class="badge bg-${agent.status === 'active' ? 'success' : 'secondary'}">
                            ${agent.status}
                        </span>
                    </div>
                    <small class="text-muted">${agent.walletAddress.substring(0, 8)}...</small>
                </a>
            `).join('');
        }

        // Create new agent
        async function createNewAgent() {
            const modal = new bootstrap.Modal(document.getElementById('createAgentModal'));
            modal.show();
        }

        async function submitCreateAgent() {
            const name = document.getElementById('agentName').value;
            const amount = document.getElementById('initialFunding').value;
            const token = document.getElementById('fundingToken').value;

            try {
                // Create agent
                const agent = await agentManager.createAgent(window.ethereum.selectedAddress, {
                    name,
                    initialFunding: {
                        amount,
                        token
                    }
                });

                // Fund agent
                await agentManager.fundAgent(agent.id, amount, token);

                // Refresh list
                await loadAgents();
                
                // Close modal
                bootstrap.Modal.getInstance(document.getElementById('createAgentModal')).hide();

            } catch (error) {
                console.error('Failed to create agent:', error);
                alert('Failed to create agent');
            }
        }

        // Initialize
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            loadAgents();
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

<script>
function updateAgentMonitor() {
    // Simulated agent status updates
    const agents = [
        { name: 'Community Manager', status: 'active', load: '45%', responseTime: '1.2s' },
        { name: 'Content Creator', status: 'active', load: '67%', responseTime: '2.1s' },
        { name: 'Analytics Agent', status: 'idle', load: '12%', responseTime: '0.8s' }
    ];

    const tableBody = document.getElementById('agentStatusTable');
    tableBody.innerHTML = agents.map(agent => `
        <tr>
            <td>${agent.name}</td>
            <td><span class="badge bg-${agent.status === 'active' ? 'success' : 'secondary'}">${agent.status}</span></td>
            <td>${agent.load}</td>
            <td>${agent.responseTime}</td>
            <td>
                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary me-1" onclick="configureAgent('${agent.name}')">
                    <i class="fas fa-cog"></i>
                </button>
                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-danger" onclick="pauseAgent('${agent.name}')">
                    <i class="fas fa-pause"></i>
                </button>
            </td>
        </tr>
    `).join('');
}

// Update monitor every 5 seconds
setInterval(updateAgentMonitor, 5000);
</script>

<style>
.timeline {
    max-height: 400px;
    overflow-y: auto;
}

.stat-item label {
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
    color: #6c757d;
}

.progress {
    height: 1.5rem;
}
</style>

                                    <span class="feature-badge">Low Fees</span>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script src="js/bsvWalletHandler.js"></script>

                            </button>

                                <div class="h6 mb-0">1.24</div>

                                <div class="h6 mb-0 text-success">
                                    <i class="fas fa-circle me-1"></i>Online
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-2">
                        <div class="d-grid gap-2">
                            <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="manageTribe('neural-ai')">
                                <i class="fas fa-cog me-2"></i>Manage
                            </button>
                            <button class="btn btn-outline-secondary" onclick="viewAnalytics('neural-ai')">
                                <i class="fas fa-chart-line me-2"></i>Analytics
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        function manageTribe(tribeId) {
            // Load the tribe's dashboard
            const mainContent = document.getElementById('setupContent');
            fetch(`/components/dashboards/${tribeId}.html`)
                .then(response => response.text())
                .then(html => {
                    mainContent.innerHTML = html;
                });
        }

        function viewAnalytics(tribeId) {
            // Load analytics dashboard
            const mainContent = document.getElementById('setupContent');
            fetch(`/components/analytics/${tribeId}.html`)
                .then(response => response.text())
                .then(html => {
                    mainContent.innerHTML = html;
                });
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>

<nav class="navbar navbar-expand-lg navbar-light bg-white shadow-sm fixed-top">
    <div class="container-fluid">
        <a class="navbar-brand" href="/">
            <img src="tribes_logo.png" alt="AI Tribes Logo">
            AI Tribes
        </a>
        <button class="navbar-toggler" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#navbarNav">
            <span class="navbar-toggler-icon"></span>
        </button>
        <div class="collapse navbar-collapse" id="navbarNav">

    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>
    <script>
        // Initialize performance graph
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const ctx = document.createElement('canvas');
            document.getElementById('performanceGraph').appendChild(ctx);
            
            new Chart(ctx, {
                type: 'line',
                data: {
                    labels: ['Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat', 'Sun'],
                    datasets: [{
                        label: 'Bandwidth Usage (TB)',
                        data: [1.2, 1.4, 1.1, 1.8, 1.3, 0.9, 1.5],
                        borderColor: '#0d6efd',
                        tension: 0.4
                    }]
                },
                options: {
                    responsive: true,
                    maintainAspectRatio: false,
                    plugins: {
                        legend: {
                            display: false
                        }
                    }
                }
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

<body>
    <div class="dashboard-container">
        <div class="content-section">
            <!-- Neural AI Header -->

                    computational power is directly tied to economic stake through BSV addresses.
                </p>
            </div>

                <div class="neural-card">
                    <h3 class="neural-heading">Economically Weighted Intelligence</h3>
                    <p class="neural-text">
                        Our groundbreaking approach uses BSV UTXOs as neural weights, creating a natural selection
                        mechanism where successful neural pathways are reinforced by actual economic stake. This mimics
                        biological neural networks while ensuring economic rationality.
                    </p>
                </div>

                <div class="neural-card">
                    <h3 class="neural-heading">Decentralized Learning</h3>
                    <p class="neural-text">
                        Each BSV address acts as a network node, contributing to a collectively trained model. Node
                        influence is proportional to UTXO value, ensuring that those with proven economic success have
                        greater impact on network decisions.
                    </p>
                </div>

                <div class="neural-card">
                    <h3 class="neural-heading">Real-World Alignment</h3>
                    <p class="neural-text">
                        By linking computational decisions to economic outcomes, Neural AI ensures AI development aligns with
                        tangible value creation, preventing misaligned optimization and promoting beneficial outcomes.
                    </p>
                </div>
            </div>

            <!-- Network Status -->
            <div class="neural-card">
                <h2 class="neural-heading">Network Status</h2>
                <div class="neural-grid">
                    <div class="neural-stat">
                        <div class="neural-stat-value">1,247</div>
                        <div class="neural-stat-label">Active Nodes</div>
                        <small class="text-success">+12.5%</small>
                    </div>
                    <div class="neural-stat">
                        <div class="neural-stat-value">8</div>
                        <div class="neural-stat-label">Network TVL</div>
                        <small class="text-info">157.3M</small>
                    </div>
                    <div class="neural-stat">
                        <div class="neural-stat-value">1.24</div>
                        <div class="neural-stat-label">Avg. Node Weight</div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</body>
</html>

                <form id="tribeDomainForm">

                               placeholder="yourtribe.com" required>

                    </div>

                        <label class="form-label">DNS Configuration</label>
                        <div class="card bg-light">
                            <div class="card-body">
                                <h6>Add these DNS records:</h6>
                                <div class="mb-2">
                                    <small class="text-muted">A Record:</small>
                                    <code class="d-block">@ → 123.45.67.89</code>
                                </div>
                                <div class="mb-2">
                                    <small class="text-muted">CNAME Record:</small>
                                    <code class="d-block">www → @</code>
                                </div>
                                <div>
                                    <small class="text-muted">TXT Record:</small>
                                    <code class="d-block">@ → "tribe-verification=abc123"</code>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="mb-3">
                        <div class="d-grid">
                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary" onclick="verifyDomain()">
                                <i class="fas fa-globe"></i> Verify Domain
                            </button>
                        </div>
                        <div class="form-text text-center">
                            We'll verify your domain ownership through DNS records
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div id="domainPreview" class="mb-3 d-none">
                        <label class="form-label">Connected Domain</label>
                        <div class="card">
                            <div class="card-body">
                                <div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                                    <div>
                                        <h6 id="verifiedDomain" class="mb-1"></h6>
                                        <small class="text-success">
                                            <i class="fas fa-check-circle"></i> DNS Verified
                                        </small>
                                    </div>
                                    <span class="badge bg-success">Connected</span>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="modal-footer">
                        <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Save & Continue</button>
                    </div>
                </form>
            </div>

                        <option value="yours">Yours Wallet</option>

<div id="createPFPs" class="section mb-3">
    <div class="card">
        <div class="card-body">
            <h2 class="h5">Create Your Tribe's PFP NFTs</h2>
            <form onsubmit="return handlePFPSubmit(event)">
                <div class="mb-3">
                    <label class="form-label">Collection Name</label>
                    <input type="text" class="form-control" id="collectionName" placeholder="Collection Name" required>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                    <label class="form-label">Collection Size</label>
                    <input type="number" class="form-control" id="collectionSize" placeholder="Number of NFTs" required min="1" max="10000">
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                    <label class="form-label">Style Description</label>
                    <textarea class="form-control" id="stylePrompt" rows="3" placeholder="Describe the style of your PFPs..." required></textarea>
                </div>
                <div class="mb-3">
                    <label class="form-label">Traits</label>
                    <div id="traitsList">
                        <div class="trait-item mb-2">
                            <input type="text" class="form-control" placeholder="Trait name (e.g., Background, Hair, Eyes)">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-sm btn-secondary" onclick="addTraitField()">+ Add Trait</button>
                </div>
                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-custom btn-sm">Generate PFP Collection</button>
            </form>
            <div id="pfpPreview" class="mt-3 d-none">
                <h6>Preview</h6>
                <div class="row" id="pfpPreviewImages">
                    <!-- Preview images will be added here -->
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <div class="row g-3">

            <label class="form-label">Voting System</label>
            <select class="form-select">
                <option>Token-weighted</option>
                <option>Quadratic Voting</option>
                <option>Multi-signature</option>
            </select>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-6">
            <label class="form-label">Proposal Threshold</label>
            <div class="input-group">
                <input type="number" class="form-control">
                <span class="input-group-text">tokens</span>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-6">
            <label class="form-label">Voting Period</label>
            <select class="form-select">
                <option>3 Days</option>
                <option>1 Week</option>
                <option>2 Weeks</option>
                <option>Custom</option>
            </select>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-6">
            <label class="form-label">Quorum</label>
            <div class="input-group">
                <input type="number" class="form-control">
                <span class="input-group-text">%</span>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="d-flex justify-content-end mt-4">
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-secondary me-2">Cancel</button>
        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Save Governance Settings</button>

                            <option value="bootstrap">Bootstrapped</option>
                            <option value="pre-seed">Pre-seed</option>
                            <option value="seed">Seed</option>
                            <option value="series-a">Series A</option>
                            <option value="series-b">Series B+</option>
                            <option value="public">Publicly Traded</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-12">
                        <div class="alert alert-info d-flex align-items-center">
                            <i class="fas fa-info-circle me-2"></i>
                            <div>
                                <strong>Stage vs Access:</strong> Your tribe's stage reflects its maturity, while access control determines who can join. These can be updated as your tribe grows.
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Initial Setup -->

                <div class="row g-3">

                            <option value="en">English</option>
                            <option value="es">Spanish</option>

                            <option value="de">German</option>

                        </select>

                        <select class="form-select" name="timezone">
                            <option value="UTC">UTC</option>
                            <option value="EST">Eastern Time</option>

                            <option value="GMT">GMT</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-12">
                        <div class="form-check form-switch">
                            <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" name="aiFeatures" checked>
                            <label class="form-check-label">Enable AI Features</label>
                            <div class="form-text">Allow AI agents to assist in tribe management and content creation</div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-12">
                        <div class="form-check form-switch">
                            <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" name="tokenomics">
                            <label class="form-check-label">Enable Tokenomics</label>
                            <div class="form-text">Create a token for your tribe (can be configured later)</div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary" onclick="generateRandomTribe()">
                <i class="fas fa-magic me-2"></i>Generate Random
            </button>
            <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">
                <i class="fas fa-check me-2"></i>Create Tribe
            </button>
        </div>
    </form>
</div> 

// Event handler for 'Create New AI Tribe' button
document.getElementById('createNewAITribeButton').classList.add('btn-success');
document.getElementById('createNewAITribeButton').addEventListener('click', function() {
    document.getElementById('01Button').click();
});

<script>
function addObjective() {
    const objectivesList = document.getElementById('objectivesList');
    const newObjective = document.createElement('div');
    newObjective.className = 'input-group mb-2';
    newObjective.innerHTML = `
        <input type="text" class="form-control" name="objectives[]" placeholder="Add a key objective">
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-danger" onclick="this.parentElement.remove()">
            <i class="fas fa-minus"></i>
        </button>
    `;
    objectivesList.appendChild(newObjective);
}
</script>

                            class="img-fluid mb-3" style="max-height: 150px;">

                            <input type="file" id="logoUpload" hidden accept="image/*" onchange="handleLogoUpload(event)">

<div class="section-content">
    <h4 class="mb-4">Connect X Profiles</h4>
    
    <div class="card mb-4">
        <div class="card-body">
            <h5 class="mb-3">Primary Tribe Account</h5>
            <div class="row g-3">
                <div class="col-md-6">
                    <label class="form-label">X Profile Handle</label>
                    <div class="input-group">
                        <span class="input-group-text">@</span>
                        <input type="text" class="form-control" name="primaryHandle" required>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-6">
                    <label class="form-label">Account Type</label>
                    <select class="form-select" name="primaryAccountType" required>
                        <option value="brand">Brand Account</option>
                        <option value="community">Community Account</option>
                        <option value="dao">DAO Account</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-12">
                    <div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                        <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="connectXAccount('primary')">
                            <i class="fab fa-twitter me-2"></i>Connect Primary Account
                        </button>
                        <div id="primaryAccountStatus" class="text-muted">
                            <i class="fas fa-circle-notch me-2"></i>Not Connected
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="card mb-4">
        <div class="card-body">
            <div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center mb-3">
                <h5 class="mb-0">AI Agent Accounts</h5>
                <div>
                    <button class="btn btn-outline-secondary btn-sm me-2" onclick="importAgents()">
                        <i class="fas fa-file-import me-2"></i>Import Agents
                    </button>

                        <i class="fas fa-plus me-2"></i>Add Agent Account
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div id="agentAccountsList">
                <!-- Agent accounts will be added here dynamically -->
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="card mb-4">
        <div class="card-body">
            <h5 class="mb-3">X API Configuration</h5>
            <div class="row g-3">
                <div class="col-md-6">
                    <label class="form-label">API Key</label>
                    <div class="input-group">
                        <input type="password" class="form-control" name="apiKey" required>

    <div class="section-description">
        Link your tribe's X (Twitter) account to @ai_tribes
    </div>

    <script>
        let connectedAccounts = new Set();

        function addNewAgentAccount() {
            const accountId = Date.now();
            const template = `
                <div class="agent-account border rounded p-3 mb-3" id="agent-${accountId}">
                    <div class="row g-3">
                        <div class="col-md-6">
                            <label class="form-label">Agent Name</label>
                            <input type="text" class="form-control" name="agentName_${accountId}" required>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-6">
                            <label class="form-label">X Handle</label>
                            <div class="input-group">
                                <span class="input-group-text">@</span>
                                <input type="text" class="form-control" name="agentHandle_${accountId}" required>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-6">
                            <label class="form-label">Role</label>
                            <select class="form-select" name="agentRole_${accountId}" onchange="updateRoleSettings(${accountId})">
                                <option value="community">Community Manager</option>
                                <option value="support">Support Agent</option>
                                <option value="content">Content Creator</option>
                                <option value="analyst">Data Analyst</option>
                                <option value="custom">Custom Role</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-6">
                            <label class="form-label">Posting Frequency</label>
                            <select class="form-select" name="postFrequency_${accountId}">
                                <option value="high">High (Multiple times per day)</option>
                                <option value="medium">Medium (Daily)</option>
                                <option value="low">Low (Weekly)</option>
                                <option value="manual">Manual Only</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-12 role-settings" id="roleSettings_${accountId}">
                            <!-- Role-specific settings will be added here -->
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-12">
                            <div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                                <div>
                                    <button class="btn btn-outline-primary" onclick="connectXAccount('${accountId}')">
                                        <i class="fab fa-twitter me-2"></i>Connect Account
                                    </button>
                                    <span class="connection-status ms-3 text-muted" id="status_${accountId}">
                                        <i class="fas fa-circle-notch me-2"></i>Not Connected
                                    </span>
                                </div>
                                <button class="btn btn-outline-danger" onclick="removeAgentAccount('${accountId}')">
                                    <i class="fas fa-trash me-2"></i>Remove Agent
                                </button>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `;
            
            document.getElementById('agentAccountsList').insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', template);
            updateRoleSettings(accountId);
        }

        function updateRoleSettings(accountId) {
            const role = document.querySelector(`select[name="agentRole_${accountId}"]`).value;
            const settingsContainer = document.getElementById(`roleSettings_${accountId}`);
            
            let settingsHTML = '<div class="row g-3 mt-2">';
            
            switch(role) {
                case 'community':
                    settingsHTML += `
                        <div class="col-md-6">
                            <div class="form-check form-switch">
                                <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" name="autoReply_${accountId}" checked>
                                <label class="form-check-label">Enable Auto-Replies</label>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-6">
                            <div class="form-check form-switch">
                                <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" name="monitoring_${accountId}" checked>
                                <label class="form-check-label">Enable Community Monitoring</label>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    `;
                    break;
                case 'support':
                    settingsHTML += `
                        <div class="col-md-6">
                            <div class="form-check form-switch">
                                <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" name="ticketing_${accountId}" checked>
                                <label class="form-check-label">Enable Ticket Creation</label>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-6">
                            <select class="form-select" name="supportLevel_${accountId}">
                                <option value="l1">L1 Support</option>
                                <option value="l2">L2 Support</option>
                                <option value="l3">L3 Support</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                    `;
                    break;
                case 'content':
                    settingsHTML += `
                        <div class="col-md-6">
                            <select class="form-select" name="contentType_${accountId}">
                                <option value="news">News & Updates</option>
                                <option value="educational">Educational Content</option>
                                <option value="engagement">Engagement Posts</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-6">
                            <div class="form-check form-switch">
                                <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" name="scheduling_${accountId}" checked>
                                <label class="form-check-label">Enable Content Scheduling</label>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    `;
                    break;
            }
            
            settingsHTML += '</div>';
            settingsContainer.innerHTML = settingsHTML;
        }

        function removeAgentAccount(accountId) {
            if (connectedAccounts.has(accountId)) {
                if (!confirm('This account is connected. Are you sure you want to remove it?')) {
                    return;
                }
                connectedAccounts.delete(accountId);
            }
            document.getElementById(`agent-${accountId}`).remove();
        }

        function connectXAccount(accountId) {
            const statusElement = document.getElementById(`status_${accountId}`);
            statusElement.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-circle-notch fa-spin me-2"></i>Connecting...';
            
            // Simulate OAuth connection
            setTimeout(() => {
                statusElement.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-check-circle me-2 text-success"></i>Connected';
                connectedAccounts.add(accountId);
            }, 2000);
        }

        function togglePassword(button) {
            const input = button.parentElement.querySelector('input');
            if (input.type === 'password') {
                input.type = 'text';
                button.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-eye-slash"></i>';
            } else {
                input.type = 'password';
                button.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-eye"></i>';
            }
        }

        function importAgents() {
            // Implement agent import functionality
            alert('Import functionality to be implemented');
        }

        // Add one agent account by default
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            addNewAgentAccount();
        });
    </script>
</div>

<div class="section-content">
    <h4 class="mb-4">Domain & Hosting Setup</h4>
    
    <!-- Instructions Box -->

        <ol class="mb-0">
            <li>Choose or connect your domain registrar</li>
            <li>Select your hosting provider</li>
            <li>Configure basic services (website, email)</li>
            <li>Set up agent access for website management</li>
        </ol>
    </div>
    
    <form id="domainForm">
        <!-- Domain Registration -->
        <div class="domain-section mb-4 pb-3 border-bottom">
            <h5>Domain Configuration</h5>
            <div class="alert alert-light border mb-3">
                <small><i class="fas fa-lightbulb me-2"></i>Connect your domain or register a new one</small>
            </div>
            
            <div class="row g-3">
                <div class="col-md-6">
                    <label class="form-label">Domain Name</label>
                    <div class="input-group">
                        <input type="text" name="domainName" class="form-control" placeholder="yourtribe">
                        <select class="form-select" style="max-width: 120px;" name="tld">
                            <option value=".com">.com</option>
                            <option value=".io">.io</option>
                            <option value=".ai">.ai</option>
                            <option value=".dao">.dao</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-6">
                    <label class="form-label">Registrar</label>
                    <select class="form-select" name="registrar">
                        <option value="namecheap">Namecheap</option>
                        <option value="godaddy">GoDaddy</option>
                        <option value="cloudflare">Cloudflare</option>
                        <option value="other">Other</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Hosting Configuration -->
        <div class="hosting-section mb-4 pb-3 border-bottom">
            <h5>Hosting Setup</h5>
            <div class="alert alert-light border mb-3">
                <small><i class="fas fa-lightbulb me-2"></i>Configure where your tribe's website will be hosted</small>
            </div>
            
            <div class="row g-3">
                <div class="col-md-6">
                    <label class="form-label">Hosting Provider</label>
                    <select class="form-select" name="hostingProvider" id="hostingProvider">
                        <option value="vercel">Vercel (Recommended)</option>
                        <option value="netlify">Netlify</option>
                        <option value="digitalocean">DigitalOcean</option>
                        <option value="aws">AWS</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-6">
                    <label class="form-label">Authentication Type</label>
                    <select class="form-select" name="authType" id="authType">
                        <option value="token">API Token</option>
                        <option value="oauth">OAuth</option>
                        <option value="key">Access Key</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="col-12" id="authDetails">
                    <div class="input-group">
                        <input type="password" class="form-control" name="authToken" placeholder="Enter your authentication token">
                        <button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary" onclick="verifyHostingAuth()">
                            Verify Access
                        </button>
                    </div>
                    <small class="text-muted">Your credentials are encrypted and only used for deployment</small>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Additional Services -->
        <div class="services-section mb-4 pb-3 border-bottom">
            <h5>Additional Services</h5>
            <div class="row g-3">
                <div class="col-md-6">
                    <div class="service-card p-3 border rounded">
                        <h6><i class="fas fa-envelope me-2"></i>Email Configuration</h6>
                        <div class="form-check mb-2">

                            </label>
                        </div>
                        <select class="form-select form-select-sm mt-2" name="emailProvider" disabled>

                        </select>
                    </div>
                </div>

                                Auto SSL/HTTPS
                            </label>

                                DDOS Protection
                            </label>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

<style>
.style-selectable {
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.style-selectable:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
    box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}

.style-selectable.selected {
    border-color: #0d6efd;
    background-color: rgba(13, 110, 253, 0.05);
}

.method-selectable {
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
}

.method-selectable:hover {
    transform: translateY(-3px);
    box-shadow: 0 3px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}

.method-selectable.selected {
    border-color: #0d6efd;
    background-color: rgba(13, 110, 253, 0.05);
}

.preview-grid img {
    border-radius: 8px;
    transition: transform 0.2s ease;
}

.preview-grid img:hover {
    transform: scale(1.05);
}
</style>

                                    <input type="text" class="form-control" value="Not Set" disabled>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <div class="alert alert-light border">
                            <div class="d-flex">
                                <div class="me-3">
                                    <i class="fas fa-info-circle text-primary fa-2x"></i>
                                </div>
                                <div>
                                    <h6>Continue Setup</h6>
                                    <p class="mb-0">Your tribe is currently in draft status. Continue the setup process to define token economics, governance structure, and community tools.</p>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Back to Dashboard Button -->
        <div class="d-grid gap-2 mt-4">
            <button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-secondary" onclick="window.parent.location.reload()">Back to Dashboard</button>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Bootstrap JS -->
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>
</body>
</html>

================================================
File: /New/contracts/AgentWallet.sol
================================================
// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT
pragma solidity ^0.8.19;

import "@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol";
import "@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol";

contract AgentWallet is Ownable {
    address public agent;
    address public platform;
    mapping(address => uint256) public balances;
    
    event Funded(address token, uint256 amount);
    event ServicePayment(address service, uint256 amount);
    
    constructor(address _agent, address _platform) {
        agent = _agent;
        platform = _platform;
    }
    
    // Fund the wallet
    function fund(address token, uint256 amount) external {
        require(IERC20(token).transferFrom(msg.sender, address(this), amount), "Transfer failed");
        balances[token] += amount;
        emit Funded(token, amount);
    }
    
    // Pay for service
    function payService(
        address token,
        address service,
        uint256 amount,
        uint256 platformFee
    ) external {
        require(msg.sender == platform, "Only platform can initiate payments");
        require(balances[token] >= amount + platformFee, "Insufficient balance");
        
        // Pay service provider
        require(IERC20(token).transfer(service, amount), "Service payment failed");
        
        // Pay platform fee
        require(IERC20(token).transfer(platform, platformFee), "Platform fee payment failed");
        
        balances[token] -= (amount + platformFee);
        emit ServicePayment(service, amount);
    }
} 

================================================

/* Banner image specifications */
.tribe-banner img {
    width: 100%;
    height: 200px;

                url('../assets/tribes/research/banner.jpg');

.toast {
    position: fixed;
    bottom: 20px;
    right: 20px;
    min-width: 250px;
    z-index: 1050;
    background: white;
    border-radius: 4px;
    box-shadow: 0 0.5rem 1rem rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
}

.toast.show {
    display: block;
    opacity: 1;
    animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease-in;
}

.toast-success .toast-header {
    background-color: #d4edda;
    color: #155724;
}

.toast-error .toast-header {
    background-color: #f8d7da;
    color: #721c24;
}

@keyframes fadeIn {
    from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); }
    to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
}

.chart-container {
    height: 400px;
    width: 100%;
    background: #f8f9fa;
    border-radius: 4px;

File: /New/css/image-states.css
================================================
/* Loading and error states for images */
.image-container {
    position: relative;
    background: #f8f9fa;
    overflow: hidden;
}

.image-container::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: -100%;
    width: 200%;
    height: 100%;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.2), transparent);
    animation: loading 1.5s infinite;
}

@keyframes loading {
    from { transform: translateX(-100%); }
    to { transform: translateX(100%); }
}

.image-error {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    background: #f8f9fa;
    color: #6c757d;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    padding: 1rem;
}

/* Specific placeholder sizes */
.banner-placeholder {
    height: 200px;
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, #f1f3f5, #e9ecef);
}

.logo-placeholder {
    width: 60px;
    height: 60px;
    border-radius: 12px;
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, #e9ecef, #dee2e6);
}

.avatar-placeholder {
    width: 48px;
    height: 48px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, #e9ecef, #dee2e6);
}

/* Pricing Cards */
.pricing-card {
    background: white;
    border-radius: 15px;
    padding: 2rem;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
    transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
    height: 100%;
}

.pricing-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
    box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}

.pricing-card.featured {
    border: 2px solid #0d6efd;
    position: relative;
}

/* Pricing Header */
.pricing-header {
    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

    color: #212529;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

    font-size: 2.5rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #0d6efd;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    vertical-align: super;
}

    font-size: 1rem;
    color: #6c757d;
    font-weight: normal;
}

    list-style: none;
    padding: 0;
