================================================
File: /assets/js/wallet-connect.js
================================================
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // Load the wallet modal component
    fetch('/components/wallet-modal.html')
        .then(response => response.text())
        .then(html => {
            document.getElementById('walletModalContainer').innerHTML = html;
            walletModal = new bootstrap.Modal(document.getElementById('walletModal'));
            
            // Add event listeners for network filtering
            document.querySelectorAll('.btn-network-filter').forEach(btn => {
                btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const network = this.dataset.network;
                    filterWallets(network);
                });
            });
            
            // Add search functionality
            const searchInput = document.querySelector('.wallet-search input');
            if (searchInput) {
                searchInput.addEventListener('input', function(e) {
                    searchWallets(e.target.value);
                });
            }
        });
});

function openWalletModal() {
    if (walletModal) {
        walletModal.show();
    }
}

// Add search and filter functions
function searchWallets(query) {
    const wallets = document.querySelectorAll('.wallet-option');
    query = query.toLowerCase();
    
    wallets.forEach(wallet => {
        const name = wallet.querySelector('h6').textContent.toLowerCase();
        const desc = wallet.querySelector('p').textContent.toLowerCase();
        if (name.includes(query) || desc.includes(query)) {
            wallet.style.display = 'block';
        } else {
            wallet.style.display = 'none';
        }
    });
}

function filterWallets(network) {
    const wallets = document.querySelectorAll('.wallet-option');
    if (network === 'all') {
        wallets.forEach(wallet => wallet.style.display = 'block');
        return;
    }
    
    wallets.forEach(wallet => {
        const badge = wallet.querySelector('.badge:last-child');
        const walletNetwork = badge.textContent;
        if (walletNetwork.includes(network)) {
            wallet.style.display = 'block';
        } else {
            wallet.style.display = 'none';
        }
    });
}

async function connectPhantom() {
    try {
        if (!window.solana || !window.solana.isPhantom) {
            window.open('https://phantom.app/', '_blank');
            return;
        }
        
        const resp = await window.solana.connect();
        const address = resp.publicKey.toString();
        updateWalletUI(address);
        walletModal.hide();
    } catch (err) {
        console.error('Phantom connection error:', err);
    }
}

async function connectMetaMask() {
    try {
        if (!window.ethereum || !window.ethereum.isMetaMask) {
            window.open('https://metamask.io/download/', '_blank');
            return;
        }

        const accounts = await window.ethereum.request({ 
            method: 'eth_requestAccounts' 
        });
        updateWalletUI(accounts[0]);
        walletModal.hide();
    } catch (err) {
        console.error('MetaMask connection error:', err);
    }
}

async function connectBinanceWallet() {
    try {
        if (!window.BinanceChain) {
            window.open('https://www.bnbchain.org/en/wallet', '_blank');
            return;
        }

        const accounts = await window.BinanceChain.request({ 
            method: 'eth_requestAccounts' 
        });
        updateWalletUI(accounts[0]);
        walletModal.hide();
    } catch (err) {
        console.error('Binance Wallet connection error:', err);
    }
}

async function connectXverse() {
    try {
        if (!window.BitcoinProvider) {
            window.open('https://www.xverse.app/', '_blank');
            return;
        }

        const accounts = await window.BitcoinProvider.connect();
        updateWalletUI(accounts[0]);
        walletModal.hide();
    } catch (err) {
        console.error('Xverse connection error:', err);
    }
}

async function connectTrustWallet() {
    try {
        if (!window.trustwallet) {
            window.open('https://trustwallet.com/download', '_blank');
            return;
        }

        const accounts = await window.trustwallet.request({ 
            method: 'eth_requestAccounts' 
        });
        updateWalletUI(accounts[0]);
        walletModal.hide();
    } catch (err) {
        console.error('Trust Wallet connection error:', err);
    }
}

async function connectHandCash() {
    try {
        if (!window.handCash) {
            window.open('https://handcash.io/#download', '_blank');
            return;
        }

        const authToken = await window.handCash.connect();
        const account = await window.handCash.getProfile();
        updateWalletUI(account.handle);
        walletModal.hide();
    } catch (err) {
        console.error('HandCash connection error:', err);
    }
}

function updateWalletUI(account) {
    document.querySelectorAll('.wallet-connect-btn').forEach(btn => {
        // Format account string based on length
        const displayAccount = account.length > 20 
            ? `${account.substring(0, 6)}...${account.substring(account.length - 4)}`
            : account;

        btn.innerHTML = `
            <i class="fas fa-wallet me-2"></i>
            ${displayAccount}
        `;
        btn.classList.remove('btn-primary', 'btn-outline-primary');
        btn.classList.add('btn-success');
    });
}

// Add other wallet connection functions here

    <!-- Bootstrap JS -->
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>
    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const profileForm = document.getElementById('profileForm');
            const profileImage = document.getElementById('profileImage');
            const imageUpload = document.getElementById('imageUpload');

            // Handle profile image upload
            imageUpload.addEventListener('change', function(e) {
                const file = e.target.files[0];
                if (file) {
                    const reader = new FileReader();
                    reader.onload = function(e) {
                        profileImage.src = e.target.result;
                    }
                    reader.readAsDataURL(file);
                }
            });

            // Handle form submission
            profileForm.addEventListener('submit', async function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();

                // Show loading state
                const submitButton = this.querySelector('button[type="submit"]');
                const originalText = submitButton.innerHTML;
                submitButton.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-spinner fa-spin me-2"></i>Saving...';
                submitButton.disabled = true;

                try {
                    // Collect form data
                    const formData = {
                        displayName: document.getElementById('displayName').value,
                        username: document.getElementById('username').value,
                        bio: document.getElementById('bio').value,
                        email: document.getElementById('email').value,
                        location: document.getElementById('location').value,
                        social: {
                            twitter: document.getElementById('twitter').value,
                            github: document.getElementById('github').value,
                            discord: document.getElementById('discord').value,
                            telegram: document.getElementById('telegram').value
                        },
                        wallets: {
                            eth: document.getElementById('ethAddress').value,
                            sol: document.getElementById('solAddress').value,
                            handcash: document.getElementById('handcashHandle').value
                        }
                    };

                    // TODO: Replace with your actual API endpoint
                    // const response = await fetch('/api/profile/update', {
                    //     method: 'POST',
                    //     headers: {
                    //         'Content-Type': 'application/json',
                    //     },
                    //     body: JSON.stringify(formData)
                    // });

                    // Simulate API call
                    await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000));

                    // Show success message
                    const toast = document.createElement('div');
                    toast.className = 'position-fixed bottom-0 end-0 p-3';
                    toast.style.zIndex = '11';
                    toast.innerHTML = `
                        <div class="toast show align-items-center text-white bg-success border-0" role="alert">
                            <div class="d-flex">
                                <div class="toast-body">
                                    <i class="fas fa-check-circle me-2"></i>Profile updated successfully!
                                </div>
                                <button type="button" class="btn-close btn-close-white me-2 m-auto" data-bs-dismiss="toast"></button>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    `;
                    document.body.appendChild(toast);
                    setTimeout(() => toast.remove(), 3000);

                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('Error saving profile:', error);
                    // Show error message
                    const toast = document.createElement('div');
                    toast.className = 'position-fixed bottom-0 end-0 p-3';
                    toast.style.zIndex = '11';
                    toast.innerHTML = `
                        <div class="toast show align-items-center text-white bg-danger border-0" role="alert">
                            <div class="d-flex">
                                <div class="toast-body">
                                    <i class="fas fa-exclamation-circle me-2"></i>Error saving profile. Please try again.
                                </div>
                                <button type="button" class="btn-close btn-close-white me-2 m-auto" data-bs-dismiss="toast"></button>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    `;
                    document.body.appendChild(toast);
                    setTimeout(() => toast.remove(), 3000);
                } finally {
                    // Restore button state
                    submitButton.innerHTML = originalText;
                    submitButton.disabled = false;
                }
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

    <!-- Bootstrap CSS -->

    <!-- Font Awesome -->

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0/css/all.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body>
    <div class="welcome-content text-center py-5">
        <h1 class="display-4 mb-3">Welcome to AI Tribes</h1>
        <p class="lead text-muted mb-5">Create and manage your AI-powered community</p>

        <div class="container">
            <div class="row g-4">
                <!-- Create New Tribe -->
                <div class="col-md-4">
                    <div class="card h-100">
                        <div class="card-body text-center p-4">
                            <h3 class="card-title mb-3">Create New Tribe</h3>
                            <p class="card-text text-muted mb-4">Start building your AI-powered community with custom features and integrations.</p>
                            <button class="btn btn-success" onclick="showCreateForm()">
                                <i class="fas fa-plus me-2"></i>Get Started
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Manage Tribes -->
                <div class="col-md-4">
                    <div class="card h-100">
                        <div class="card-body text-center p-4">
                            <h3 class="card-title mb-3">Manage Tribes</h3>
                            <p class="card-text text-muted mb-4">View and manage your existing tribes, monitor performance, and adjust settings.</p>
                            <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="loadContent('tribes')">
                                <i class="fas fa-layer-group me-2"></i>View Tribes
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Team Settings -->
                <div class="col-md-4">
                    <div class="card h-100">
                        <div class="card-body text-center p-4">
                            <h3 class="card-title mb-3">Team Settings</h3>
                            <p class="card-text text-muted mb-4">Manage team members, roles, and permissions for your tribes.</p>
                            <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="loadContent('team')">
                                <i class="fas fa-users me-2"></i>Team Settings
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <style>
        .welcome-content {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 2rem;
        }

        .card {
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            border: none;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }

        .card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
        }

        .btn {
            padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .display-4 {
            font-weight: 600;
        }

        .lead {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
        }
    </style>
</body>
</html>

<!-- Connect Your Tribe's Domain Modal -->
<div class="modal fade" id="tribeDomainModal" tabindex="-1">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <h5 class="modal-title">Connect Your Tribe's Domain</h5>
                <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="modal"></button>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <form id="tribeDomainForm">
                    <div class="mb-3">
                        <label for="domainName" class="form-label">Domain Name</label>
                        <input type="text" class="form-control" id="domainName" 
                               placeholder="yourtribe.com" required>
                        <div class="form-text">Enter your tribe's custom domain name</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="mb-3">
                        <label class="form-label">DNS Configuration</label>
                        <div class="card bg-light">
                            <div class="card-body">
                                <h6>Add these DNS records:</h6>
                                <div class="mb-2">
                                    <small class="text-muted">A Record:</small>
                                    <code class="d-block">@ → 123.45.67.89</code>
                                </div>
                                <div class="mb-2">
                                    <small class="text-muted">CNAME Record:</small>
                                    <code class="d-block">www → @</code>
                                </div>
                                <div>
                                    <small class="text-muted">TXT Record:</small>
                                    <code class="d-block">@ → "tribe-verification=abc123"</code>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="mb-3">
                        <div class="d-grid">
                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary" onclick="verifyDomain()">
                                <i class="fas fa-globe"></i> Verify Domain
                            </button>
                        </div>
                        <div class="form-text text-center">
                            We'll verify your domain ownership through DNS records
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div id="domainPreview" class="mb-3 d-none">
                        <label class="form-label">Connected Domain</label>
                        <div class="card">
                            <div class="card-body">
                                <div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                                    <div>
                                        <h6 id="verifiedDomain" class="mb-1"></h6>
                                        <small class="text-success">
                                            <i class="fas fa-check-circle"></i> DNS Verified
                                        </small>
                                    </div>
                                    <span class="badge bg-success">Connected</span>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="modal-footer">
                        <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Save & Continue</button>
                    </div>
                </form>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

                                               placeholder="API Key" id="anthropicKey">
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                <div class="card-body">
                                    <div class="form-check d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                                        <div>
                                            <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="stabilityApi">
                                            <label class="form-check-label" for="stabilityApi">
                                                <img src="assets/ai/stability-logo.svg" alt="Stability AI" class="me-2" style="width: 24px">
                                                Stability AI
                                            </label>
                                        </div>
                                        <input type="text" class="form-control form-control-sm w-50" 
                                               placeholder="API Key" id="stabilityKey">
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>

                            </button>
                        </div>

                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div id="apisPreview" class="mb-3 d-none">
                        <label class="form-label">Connected APIs</label>
                        <div class="card">
                            <div class="card-body">
                                <div id="connectedApisList">
                                    <!-- Connected APIs will be listed here -->
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="modal-footer">
                        <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-bs-dismiss="modal">Cancel</button>
                        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Save & Continue</button>
                    </div>
                </form>
            </div>
        </div>

                        Enable Gas Optimization

                           placeholder="Daily transaction limit in USD">
                </div>

            </div>

                                                       step="0.00001" min="0.00001" value="0.00001">

                                                </label>
                                            </div>

                                                </label>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    + Show Advanced Options
                                </button>

                                <!-- Advanced Options -->
                                <div id="advancedTokenOptions" class="d-none">
                                    <div class="mb-3">
                                        <label class="form-label">Token Supply Model</label>
                                        <select class="form-control" id="tokenEconomics">
                                            <option value="fixed">Fixed Supply (Like Bitcoin)</option>
                                            <option value="inflationary">Inflationary (New tokens over time)</option>
                                            <option value="deflationary">Deflationary (Tokens are burned)</option>
                                            <option value="dynamic">Dynamic (Adjusts based on usage)</option>
                                        </select>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="mb-3">
                                        <label class="form-label">Advanced Features</label>
                                        <div class="advanced-features">
                                            <div class="form-check">
                                                <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="featureVesting">
                                                <label class="form-check-label" for="featureVesting">
                                                    Vesting Schedule
                                                </label>
                                            </div>

                                                    Multi-Signature Treasury
                                                </label>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="form-check">
                                                <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="featureUpgradeable">
                                                <label class="form-check-label" for="featureUpgradeable">
                                                    Upgradeable Contract
                                                </label>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <!-- Add to Advanced Features -->
                                    <div class="mb-3">
                                        <label class="form-label">BSV Features</label>
                                        <div class="advanced-features">
                                            <div class="form-check">
                                                <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="featureMicropayments">
                                                <label class="form-check-label" for="featureMicropayments">
                                                    Micropayments
                                                    <i class="fas fa-info-circle" data-bs-toggle="tooltip" 
                                                       title="Enable tiny payments for granular content access"></i>
                                                </label>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="form-check">
                                                <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="featureDataStorage">
                                                <label class="form-check-label" for="featureDataStorage">
                                                    On-chain Data Storage
                                                    <i class="fas fa-info-circle" data-bs-toggle="tooltip" 
                                                       title="Store data directly on the BSV blockchain"></i>
                                                </label>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="form-check">
                                                <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="featureMetadata">
                                                <label class="form-check-label" for="featureMetadata">
                                                    Token Metadata
                                                    <i class="fas fa-info-circle" data-bs-toggle="tooltip" 
                                                       title="Attach metadata to tokens for rich content"></i>
                                                </label>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <button type="submit" class="btn btn-custom btn-sm">Save Tribe Details</button>
            </form>
            <div id="nameStatus" class="alert alert-info d-none mt-2">
                Status will appear here
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

File: /components/sections/01-name.html

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0/css/all.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body>
    <div class="section-content">
        <h4 class="mb-4">Create Your Tribe</h4>
        <p class="text-muted">Set up your tribe's core identity and purpose</p>

        <!-- Basic Information -->
        <div class="card mb-4">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h5 class="mb-0">Basic Information</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <div class="row g-4">
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <label class="form-label">Tribe Name*</label>
                        <input type="text" class="form-control" id="tribeName" placeholder="Enter tribe name">
                        <div class="form-text">This will be your tribe's unique identifier</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <label class="form-label">Category</label>
                        <select class="form-select" id="tribeCategory">
                            <option value="">Select a category</option>
                            <option value="gaming">Gaming</option>
                            <option value="defi">DeFi</option>
                            <option value="nft">NFT</option>
                            <option value="dao">DAO</option>
                            <option value="social">Social</option>
                            <option value="creator">Creator</option>
                            <option value="other">Other</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-12">
                        <label class="form-label">Description*</label>
                        <textarea class="form-control" id="tribeDescription" rows="3" 
                            placeholder="Describe your tribe's purpose and vision"></textarea>
                        <div class="form-text">A clear description helps potential members understand your tribe</div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Tribe Purpose -->
        <div class="card mb-4">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h5 class="mb-0">Tribe Purpose</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <div class="row g-4">
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <label class="form-label">Primary Goal</label>
                        <select class="form-select" id="primaryGoal">
                            <option value="community">Build Community</option>
                            <option value="product">Develop Product</option>
                            <option value="service">Provide Service</option>
                            <option value="investment">Investment DAO</option>
                            <option value="governance">Governance</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <label class="form-label">Target Audience</label>
                        <select class="form-select" id="targetAudience">
                            <option value="global">Global</option>
                            <option value="local">Local</option>
                            <option value="niche">Niche Interest</option>
                            <option value="professional">Professional</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-12">
                        <label class="form-label">Key Values</label>
                        <div class="value-tags d-flex flex-wrap gap-2" id="valueTagsContainer">
                            <!-- Value tags will be added here -->
                        </div>
                        <div class="input-group mt-2">
                            <input type="text" class="form-control" id="valueInput" placeholder="Add a value">
                            <button class="btn btn-outline-primary" onclick="addValue()">Add</button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Governance Structure -->
        <div class="card mb-4">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h5 class="mb-0">Governance Structure</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <div class="row g-4">
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <label class="form-label">Governance Type</label>
                        <select class="form-select" id="governanceType" onchange="updateGovernanceOptions()">
                            <option value="democratic">Democratic</option>
                            <option value="meritocratic">Meritocratic</option>
                            <option value="delegated">Delegated</option>
                            <option value="automated">AI-Automated</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <label class="form-label">Decision Making</label>
                        <select class="form-select" id="decisionMaking">
                            <option value="majority">Simple Majority</option>
                            <option value="supermajority">Super Majority</option>
                            <option value="consensus">Consensus</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-12" id="governanceOptionsContainer">
                        <!-- Dynamic governance options will be loaded here -->
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Initial Setup -->
        <div class="card mb-4">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h5 class="mb-0">Initial Setup</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <div class="row g-4">
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <label class="form-label">Privacy Setting</label>
                        <select class="form-select" id="privacySetting">
                            <option value="public">Public</option>
                            <option value="private">Private</option>
                            <option value="invite">Invite Only</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <label class="form-label">Membership Type</label>
                        <select class="form-select" id="membershipType">
                            <option value="open">Open</option>
                            <option value="token">Token Gated</option>
                            <option value="nft">NFT Gated</option>
                            <option value="application">Application Based</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Navigation Buttons -->
        <div class="d-flex justify-content-between mt-4">
            <button class="btn btn-outline-secondary" disabled>
                <i class="fas fa-arrow-left me-2"></i>Previous
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="saveAndContinue()">
                Next<i class="fas fa-arrow-right ms-2"></i>
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>

    <style>
        .value-tag {
            padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
            background: #f8f9fa;
            border-radius: 20px;
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 0.5rem;
        }

        .value-tag .remove-tag {
            cursor: pointer;
            color: #dc3545;
        }

        .form-control:focus, .form-select:focus {
            border-color: #0d6efd;
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 0.25rem rgba(13, 110, 253, 0.25);
        }
    </style>

    <script>
        let values = [];

        function addValue() {
            const input = document.getElementById('valueInput');
            const value = input.value.trim();
            
            if (value && values.length < 5) {
                values.push(value);
                updateValueTags();
                input.value = '';
            }
        }

        function removeValue(index) {
            values.splice(index, 1);
            updateValueTags();
        }

        function updateValueTags() {
            const container = document.getElementById('valueTagsContainer');
            container.innerHTML = values.map((value, index) => `
                <div class="value-tag">
                    ${value}
                    <i class="fas fa-times remove-tag" onclick="removeValue(${index})"></i>
                </div>
            `).join('');
        }

        function updateGovernanceOptions() {
            const type = document.getElementById('governanceType').value;
            const container = document.getElementById('governanceOptionsContainer');
            
            const options = {
                democratic: `
                    <div class="form-check mb-2">
                        <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="enableVoting" checked>
                        <label class="form-check-label" for="enableVoting">Enable Voting System</label>
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-check">
                        <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="enableProposals" checked>
                        <label class="form-check-label" for="enableProposals">Enable Proposal System</label>
                    </div>
                `,
                meritocratic: `
                    <div class="form-check mb-2">
                        <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="enableReputation" checked>
                        <label class="form-check-label" for="enableReputation">Enable Reputation System</label>
                    </div>
                `,
                delegated: `
                    <div class="form-check mb-2">
                        <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="enableDelegation" checked>
                        <label class="form-check-label" for="enableDelegation">Enable Delegation System</label>
                    </div>
                `,
                automated: `
                    <div class="form-check mb-2">
                        <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="enableAI" checked>
                        <label class="form-check-label" for="enableAI">Enable AI Governance</label>
                    </div>
                `
            };

            container.innerHTML = options[type] || '';
        }

        function saveAndContinue() {
            // Validate required fields
            const name = document.getElementById('tribeName').value;
            const description = document.getElementById('tribeDescription').value;

            if (!name || !description) {
                alert('Please fill in all required fields');
                return;
            }

            // Save tribe configuration
            const config = {
                basic: {
                    name,
                    category: document.getElementById('tribeCategory').value,
                    description
                },
                purpose: {
                    primaryGoal: document.getElementById('primaryGoal').value,
                    targetAudience: document.getElementById('targetAudience').value,
                    values
                },
                governance: {
                    type: document.getElementById('governanceType').value,
                    decisionMaking: document.getElementById('decisionMaking').value
                },
                setup: {
                    privacy: document.getElementById('privacySetting').value,
                    membership: document.getElementById('membershipType').value
                }
            };

            // Save to localStorage
            localStorage.setItem('tribeConfig', JSON.stringify(config));

            // Proceed to next step
            loadSetupContent('02-token');
        }

        // Initialize
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            updateGovernanceOptions();

            // Load saved config if exists
            const savedConfig = localStorage.getItem('tribeConfig');
            if (savedConfig) {
                const config = JSON.parse(savedConfig);
                // Apply saved configuration
                document.getElementById('tribeName').value = config.basic.name;
                document.getElementById('tribeCategory').value = config.basic.category;
                document.getElementById('tribeDescription').value = config.basic.description;
                values = config.purpose.values;
                updateValueTags();
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>
    <script>
        // Initialize distribution chart
        function initDistributionChart() {
            const ctx = document.createElement('canvas');
            document.getElementById('distributionChart').appendChild(ctx);
            
            new Chart(ctx, {
                type: 'pie',
                data: {
                    labels: ['Team', 'Community', 'Treasury'],
                    datasets: [{
                        data: [15, 50, 35],
                        backgroundColor: [
                            '#4ECDC4',
                            '#FF6B6B',
                            '#45B7D1'
                        ]
                    }]
                },
                options: {
                    responsive: true,
                    maintainAspectRatio: false
                }
            });
        }

        // Update chart when distribution values change
        document.querySelectorAll('.distribution-input').forEach(input => {
            input.addEventListener('change', updateDistributionChart);
        });

        function updateDistributionChart() {
            // Implementation for updating chart
        }

        function connectWallet(type) {
            console.log(`Connecting ${type} wallet...`);
            // Implement wallet connection logic
        }

        // Initialize chart when page loads
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initDistributionChart);
    </script>

    <style>
        .distribution-pie-chart {
            height: 300px;
        }
    </style>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0/css/all.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body>
    <div class="section-content">
        <h4 class="mb-4">Brand & Design</h4>
        <p class="text-muted">Create your tribe's visual identity</p>

        <!-- Logo & Visual Assets -->
        <div class="card mb-4">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h5 class="mb-0">Logo & Visual Assets</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <div class="row g-4">
                    <!-- Main Logo -->
                    <div class="col-md-4">
                        <label class="form-label">Main Logo</label>
                        <div class="upload-preview mb-2" id="logoPreview">
                            <div class="upload-placeholder">
                                <i class="fas fa-cloud-upload-alt mb-2"></i>
                                <div>Drag & drop or click to upload</div>
                                <small class="text-muted">Recommended: 512x512px PNG</small>
                            </div>
                            <img src="" class="preview-image d-none">
                            <input type="file" class="d-none" accept="image/*" onchange="handleImageUpload(this, 'logo')">
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <!-- NFT Collection -->
                    <div class="col-md-4">
                        <label class="form-label">NFT Collection</label>
                        <div class="upload-preview mb-2" id="nftPreview">
                            <div class="upload-placeholder">
                                <i class="fas fa-images mb-2"></i>
                                <div>Upload Collection</div>
                                <small class="text-muted">ZIP with PNG/JPG images</small>
                            </div>
                            <div class="preview-files d-none"></div>
                            <input type="file" class="d-none" accept=".zip" onchange="handleNFTUpload(this)">
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <!-- Banner Image -->
                    <div class="col-md-4">
                        <label class="form-label">Banner Image</label>
                        <div class="upload-preview mb-2" id="bannerPreview">
                            <div class="upload-placeholder">
                                <i class="fas fa-image mb-2"></i>
                                <div>Upload Banner</div>
                                <small class="text-muted">Recommended: 1500x500px</small>
                            </div>
                            <img src="" class="preview-image d-none">
                            <input type="file" class="d-none" accept="image/*" onchange="handleImageUpload(this, 'banner')">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Color Scheme -->
        <div class="card mb-4">
            <div class="card-header d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                <h5 class="mb-0">Color Scheme</h5>
                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary" onclick="generateColorPalette()">
                    <i class="fas fa-magic me-2"></i>Generate Palette
                </button>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <div class="row g-4">
                    <div class="col-md-3">
                        <label class="form-label">Primary Color</label>
                        <div class="input-group color-picker">
                            <input type="color" class="form-control form-control-color" value="#4ECDC4" onchange="updateColorScheme(this, 'primary')">
                            <input type="text" class="form-control" value="#4ECDC4" onchange="updateColorInput(this, 'primary')">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-3">
                        <label class="form-label">Secondary Color</label>
                        <div class="input-group color-picker">
                            <input type="color" class="form-control form-control-color" value="#FF6B6B" onchange="updateColorScheme(this, 'secondary')">
                            <input type="text" class="form-control" value="#FF6B6B" onchange="updateColorInput(this, 'secondary')">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-3">
                        <label class="form-label">Accent Color</label>
                        <div class="input-group color-picker">
                            <input type="color" class="form-control form-control-color" value="#45B7D1" onchange="updateColorScheme(this, 'accent')">
                            <input type="text" class="form-control" value="#45B7D1" onchange="updateColorInput(this, 'accent')">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-3">
                        <label class="form-label">Background</label>
                        <div class="input-group color-picker">
                            <input type="color" class="form-control form-control-color" value="#FFFFFF" onchange="updateColorScheme(this, 'background')">
                            <input type="text" class="form-control" value="#FFFFFF" onchange="updateColorInput(this, 'background')">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Color Preview -->
                <div class="color-preview mt-4 p-4 rounded">
                    <h6>Preview</h6>
                    <div class="preview-elements">
                        <button class="btn btn-primary me-2">Primary Button</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-secondary me-2">Secondary Button</button>
                        <span class="badge bg-accent me-2">Accent Badge</span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Typography -->
        <div class="card mb-4">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h5 class="mb-0">Typography</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <div class="row g-4">
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <label class="form-label">Heading Font</label>
                        <select class="form-select" onchange="updateFonts(this, 'heading')">
                            <option value="Inter">Inter</option>
                            <option value="Roboto">Roboto</option>
                            <option value="Poppins">Poppins</option>
                            <option value="custom">Custom Font...</option>
                        </select>
                        <div class="font-preview mt-3">
                            <h1 class="preview-text">Heading 1</h1>
                            <h3 class="preview-text">Heading 3</h3>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <label class="form-label">Body Font</label>
                        <select class="form-select" onchange="updateFonts(this, 'body')">
                            <option value="Inter">Inter</option>
                            <option value="Roboto">Roboto</option>
                            <option value="Poppins">Poppins</option>
                            <option value="custom">Custom Font...</option>
                        </select>
                        <div class="font-preview mt-3">
                            <p class="preview-text">Body text example</p>
                            <small class="preview-text">Small text example</small>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Design Elements -->
        <div class="card mb-4">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h5 class="mb-0">Design Elements</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <div class="row g-4">
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <label class="form-label">Button Style</label>
                        <div class="d-flex gap-2">
                            <button class="btn btn-primary" data-radius="default">Default</button>
                            <button class="btn btn-primary" data-radius="0">Square</button>
                            <button class="btn btn-primary" data-radius="25px">Pill</button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <label class="form-label">Card Style</label>
                        <div class="d-flex gap-2">
                            <div class="form-check">
                                <input class="form-check-input" type="radio" name="cardStyle" value="rounded" checked>
                                <label class="form-check-label">Rounded</label>
                            </div>
                            <div class="form-check">
                                <input class="form-check-input" type="radio" name="cardStyle" value="sharp">
                                <label class="form-check-label">Sharp</label>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Navigation Buttons -->
        <div class="d-flex justify-content-between mt-4">
            <button class="btn btn-outline-primary" onclick="loadSetupContent('02-token')">
                <i class="fas fa-arrow-left me-2"></i>Previous
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="saveBrandingAndContinue()">
                Next<i class="fas fa-arrow-right ms-2"></i>
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>

    <style>
        .upload-preview {
            border: 2px dashed #dee2e6;
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 2rem;
            text-align: center;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s;
            position: relative;
            min-height: 200px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .upload-preview:hover {
            border-color: #4ECDC4;
            background: #f8f9fa;
        }

        .preview-image {
            max-width: 100%;
            max-height: 180px;
            object-fit: contain;
        }

        .color-picker .form-control-color {
            width: 50px;
        }

        .color-preview {
            background: var(--background-color);
            border: 1px solid #dee2e6;
        }

        .font-preview {
            border: 1px solid #dee2e6;
            padding: 1rem;
            border-radius: 8px;
        }

        .preview-text {
            margin: 0;
            line-height: 1.5;
        }
    </style>

    <script>
        // Image upload handling
        function handleImageUpload(input, type) {
            const file = input.files[0];
            if (file) {
                const reader = new FileReader();
                reader.onload = function(e) {
                    const preview = document.querySelector(`#${type}Preview .preview-image`);
                    const placeholder = document.querySelector(`#${type}Preview .upload-placeholder`);
                    preview.src = e.target.result;
                    preview.classList.remove('d-none');
                    placeholder.classList.add('d-none');
                };
                reader.readAsDataURL(file);
            }
        }

        // NFT Collection upload
        function handleNFTUpload(input) {
            const file = input.files[0];
            if (file) {
                const preview = document.querySelector('#nftPreview .preview-files');
                const placeholder = document.querySelector('#nftPreview .upload-placeholder');
                preview.textContent = `Selected: ${file.name}`;
                preview.classList.remove('d-none');
                placeholder.classList.add('d-none');
            }
        }

        // Color scheme handling
        function updateColorScheme(input, type) {
            const hexInput = input.nextElementSibling;
            hexInput.value = input.value.toUpperCase();
            updatePreview();
        }

        function updateColorInput(input, type) {
            const colorPicker = input.previousElementSibling;
            colorPicker.value = input.value;
            updatePreview();
        }

        function updatePreview() {
            const root = document.documentElement;
            const colors = {
                primary: document.querySelector('[onchange="updateColorScheme(this, \'primary\')"]').value,
                secondary: document.querySelector('[onchange="updateColorScheme(this, \'secondary\')"]').value,
                accent: document.querySelector('[onchange="updateColorScheme(this, \'accent\')"]').value,
                background: document.querySelector('[onchange="updateColorScheme(this, \'background\')"]').value
            };

            root.style.setProperty('--primary-color', colors.primary);
            root.style.setProperty('--secondary-color', colors.secondary);
            root.style.setProperty('--accent-color', colors.accent);
            root.style.setProperty('--background-color', colors.background);
        }

        // Font handling
        function updateFonts(select, type) {
            const previewElements = select.parentElement.querySelector('.font-preview');
            if (select.value === 'custom') {
                // Show custom font upload dialog
                return;
            }
            previewElements.style.fontFamily = select.value;
        }

        // Save and continue
        function saveBrandingAndContinue() {
            // Save branding configuration
            const config = {
                colors: {
                    primary: document.querySelector('[onchange="updateColorScheme(this, \'primary\')"]').value,
                    secondary: document.querySelector('[onchange="updateColorScheme(this, \'secondary\')"]').value,
                    accent: document.querySelector('[onchange="updateColorScheme(this, \'accent\')"]').value,
                    background: document.querySelector('[onchange="updateColorScheme(this, \'background\')"]').value
                },
                fonts: {
                    heading: document.querySelector('[onchange="updateFonts(this, \'heading\')"]').value,
                    body: document.querySelector('[onchange="updateFonts(this, \'body\')"]').value
                },
                styles: {
                    buttonRadius: document.querySelector('.btn-primary[data-radius].active')?.dataset.radius || 'default',
                    cardStyle: document.querySelector('input[name="cardStyle"]:checked').value
                }
            };

            localStorage.setItem('brandingConfig', JSON.stringify(config));
            loadSetupContent('04-socials');
        }

        // Initialize
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            // Initialize upload handlers
            document.querySelectorAll('.upload-preview').forEach(preview => {
                preview.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    this.querySelector('input[type="file"]').click();
                });
            });

            // Load saved config if exists
            const savedConfig = localStorage.getItem('brandingConfig');
            if (savedConfig) {
                const config = JSON.parse(savedConfig);
                // Apply saved configuration
                // ... implementation here
            }

            // Initialize color preview
            updatePreview();
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

    <div class="section-content">
        <h4 class="mb-4">Brand & Design</h4>

        <!-- Logo & PFP Section -->
        <div class="card mb-4">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h5 class="mb-0">Logo & Profile Pictures</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <div class="row g-4">
                    <!-- Main Logo -->
                    <div class="col-md-4">
                        <label class="form-label">Main Logo</label>
                        <div class="upload-box mb-2">
                            <i class="fas fa-cloud-upload-alt mb-2"></i>
                            <div>Drag & drop or click to upload</div>
                            <small class="text-muted">Recommended: 512x512px PNG</small>
                            <input type="file" class="d-none" accept="image/*">
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <!-- PFP Collection -->
                    <div class="col-md-4">
                        <label class="form-label">PFP Collection</label>
                        <div class="upload-box mb-2">
                            <i class="fas fa-images mb-2"></i>
                            <div>Upload PFP Collection</div>
                            <small class="text-muted">ZIP file with PNG/JPG images</small>
                            <input type="file" class="d-none" accept=".zip">
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <!-- Banner Image -->

        .upload-box {

            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 2rem;
            text-align: center;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s;
        }
        .upload-box:hover {
            border-color: #0d6efd;
            background: #f8f9fa;
        }
        .form-control-color {
            width: 50px;
        }
        .color-box {
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-bottom: 4px;
        }

        .icon-preview {
            background: #f8f9fa;
            font-size: 24px;
        }

        .hover-demo.scale:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05);
            transition: transform 0.2s;
        }

        .hover-demo.glow:hover {
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(13, 110, 253, 0.5);
            transition: box-shadow 0.2s;
        }

        .hover-demo.lift:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            transition: transform 0.2s;
        }

        .trait-variant {
            text-align: center;
        }
    </style>

    <script>
        document.querySelectorAll('.upload-box').forEach(box => {
            box.addEventListener('click', function() {
                this.querySelector('input[type="file"]').click();
            });
        });
    </script>

    <script>
        function configureBot(platform) {
            const configDiv = document.getElementById(`${platform}BotConfig`);
            configDiv.classList.toggle('d-none');
        }

        function configureServer(platform) {
            const configDiv = document.getElementById(`${platform}ServerConfig`);
            configDiv.classList.toggle('d-none');
        }

        function connectPlatform(platform) {
            // Implement OAuth flow for each platform
            console.log(`Connecting to ${platform}...`);
        }

        function createServer(platform) {
            // Implement server creation logic
            console.log(`Creating ${platform} server...`);
        }

        function createGroup(platform) {
            // Implement group creation logic
            console.log(`Creating ${platform} group...`);
        }

        function addChannel() {
            const channelList = document.querySelector('.channel-list');
            const newChannel = document.createElement('div');
            newChannel.className = 'channel-item d-flex align-items-center mb-2';
            newChannel.innerHTML = `
                <i class="fas fa-hashtag me-2"></i>
                <input type="text" class="form-control form-control-sm" placeholder="channel-name">
                <button class="btn btn-sm btn-link text-danger" onclick="this.parentElement.remove()">
                    <i class="fas fa-times"></i>
                </button>
            `;
            channelList.insertBefore(newChannel, channelList.lastElementChild);
        }

        function showAllPlatforms() {
            // Implement modal or dropdown for all available platforms
            console.log('Showing all platforms...');
        }

        function saveSocialConfig() {
            // Save social media configuration
            const config = {
                platforms: {
                    twitter: {
                        connected: true,
                        botEnabled: document.querySelector('#twitterBotConfig select').value
                    },
                    discord: {
                        serverCreated: true,
                        template: document.querySelector('#discordServerConfig select').value
                    },
                    telegram: {
                        groupCreated: true,
                        botToken: document.querySelector('#telegramBotConfig input').value
                    }
                },
                crossPlatform: {
                    syncAnnouncements: document.getElementById('syncAnnouncements').checked,
                    syncMedia: document.getElementById('syncMedia').checked,
                    autoRespond: document.getElementById('autoRespond').checked,
                    analyticsSync: document.getElementById('analyticsSync').checked
                }
            };

            localStorage.setItem('socialConfig', JSON.stringify(config));
            loadSetupContent('05-integrations');
        }

        // Initialize
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            // Load saved config if exists
            const savedConfig = localStorage.getItem('socialConfig');
            if (savedConfig) {
                const config = JSON.parse(savedConfig);
                // Apply saved configuration
                // ... implementation here
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0/css/all.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <style>
        .service-card {
            padding: 1.5rem;
            border: 1px solid #dee2e6;
            border-radius: 12px;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            background: white;
        }

        .service-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }

        .service-logo {
            width: 48px;
            height: 48px;
            object-fit: contain;
            border-radius: 8px;
            margin-right: 12px;
        }

        .service-header {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }

        .service-info {
            flex: 1;
        }

        .service-status {
            margin-left: auto;
        }

        .category-nav {
            display: flex;
            gap: 0.5rem;
            overflow-x: auto;
            padding-bottom: 1rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }

        .category-nav::-webkit-scrollbar {
            height: 4px;
        }

        .category-nav::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
            background: #dee2e6;
            border-radius: 4px;
        }

        .service-actions {
            margin-top: 1rem;
            display: flex;
            gap: 0.5rem;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="section-content">
        <h4 class="mb-4">AI Service Integrations</h4>
        <p class="text-muted">Connect your tribe to powerful AI services across different domains</p>

        <!-- Categories -->
        <div class="category-nav">

    <script>
        // Category filtering
        document.querySelectorAll('.category-nav button').forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', function() {
                const category = this.dataset.category;
                
                // Update active button
                document.querySelectorAll('.category-nav button').forEach(btn => 
                    btn.classList.remove('active')
                );
                this.classList.add('active');

                // Filter cards
                document.querySelectorAll('.card[data-category]').forEach(card => {
                    if (category === 'all' || card.dataset.category === category) {
                        card.style.display = 'block';
                    } else {
                        card.style.display = 'none';
                    }
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

File: /components/sections/05-socials.html
================================================

    <div class="section-content">

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Connect X Profile - AI Tribes</title>
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0/css/all.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="../sections/sections.css" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body>
    <div class="section-container">
        <div class="section-header">
            <h1 class="section-title">Connect X Profile</h1>
            <p class="section-description">Link your tribe's X (Twitter) account to @ai_tribes</p>
        </div>

        <!-- Main Tribe Account -->
        <div class="connection-card mb-4">
            <div class="d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between">
                <div class="d-flex align-items-center">
                    <i class="fab fa-twitter fa-2x text-primary me-3"></i>
                    <div>
                        <h5 class="mb-1">X Account</h5>
                        <p class="text-muted mb-0">Connect your tribe's X profile</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <button class="btn btn-primary btn-section" onclick="connectXAccount('main')">Connect</button>
            </div>
        </div>

        <form>
            <div class="form-group mb-4">
                <label class="form-label">X Handle</label>
                <div class="input-group">
                    <span class="input-group-text">@</span>
                    <input type="text" class="form-control" id="mainHandle" placeholder="your_tribe">
                </div>
                <small class="text-muted">Your tribe's X username</small>
            </div>

            <!-- AI Agent Accounts -->
            <div class="connection-card mb-4">
                <div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center mb-3">
                    <h5 class="mb-0">AI Agent Accounts</h5>
                    <button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary btn-sm" onclick="addAgentAccount()">
                        <i class="fas fa-plus me-2"></i>Add Agent
                    </button>
                </div>

                <div id="agentAccounts">
                    <!-- Agent accounts will be added here -->
                </div>
            </div>

            <!-- X API Settings -->
            <div class="connection-card mb-4">
                <h5 class="mb-3">API Configuration</h5>
                <div class="row g-3">
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <label class="form-label">API Key</label>
                        <input type="password" class="form-control" id="apiKey" required>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-md-6">
                        <label class="form-label">API Secret</label>
                        <input type="password" class="form-control" id="apiSecret" required>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-secondary btn-section" onclick="window.parent.postMessage({action: 'back'}, '*')">Back</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary btn-section" onclick="window.parent.postMessage({action: 'next'}, '*')">Continue</button>
            </div>
        </form>
    </div>

    <script>
        function addAgentAccount() {
            const agentId = Date.now();
            const template = `
                <div class="agent-account border rounded p-3 mb-3" id="agent-${agentId}">
                    <div class="row g-3">
                        <div class="col-md-6">
                            <label class="form-label">Agent Name</label>
                            <input type="text" class="form-control" placeholder="e.g., Support Bot">
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-6">
                            <label class="form-label">X Handle</label>
                            <div class="input-group">
                                <span class="input-group-text">@</span>
                                <input type="text" class="form-control" placeholder="agent_handle">
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-6">
                            <label class="form-label">Role</label>
                            <select class="form-select">
                                <option value="community">Community Manager</option>
                                <option value="support">Support Agent</option>
                                <option value="content">Content Creator</option>
                                <option value="sales">Token Sales</option>
                                <option value="analyst">Data Analyst</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-md-6">
                            <label class="form-label">Posting Frequency</label>
                            <select class="form-select">
                                <option value="high">High (Multiple times/day)</option>
                                <option value="medium">Medium (Daily)</option>
                                <option value="low">Low (Weekly)</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>
                        <div class="col-12">
                            <div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">
                                <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary" onclick="connectXAccount('${agentId}')">
                                    <i class="fab fa-twitter me-2"></i>Connect Agent
                                </button>
                                <button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-danger" onclick="removeAgent('${agentId}')">
                                    <i class="fas fa-trash me-2"></i>Remove
                                </button>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `;
            document.getElementById('agentAccounts').insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', template);
        }

        function connectXAccount(id) {
            const button = id === 'main' ? 
                document.querySelector('.btn-section') : 
                document.querySelector(`#agent-${id} .btn-primary`);
            
            button.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-circle-notch fa-spin me-2"></i>Connecting...';
            
            // Simulate OAuth connection
            setTimeout(() => {
                button.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-check me-2"></i>Connected';
                button.classList.remove('btn-primary');
                button.classList.add('btn-success');
                button.disabled = true;
            }, 1500);
        }

        function removeAgent(agentId) {
            document.getElementById(`agent-${agentId}`).remove();
        }

        // Add first agent account by default
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            addAgentAccount();
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

File: /components/sections/06-integrations.html
================================================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.0/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0/css/all.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
</head>
<body>
    <div class="section-content">
        <h4 class="mb-4">Integrations</h4>
        <p class="text-muted">Connect your development and infrastructure services</p>

        <!-- GitHub Integration -->
        <div class="card mb-4">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h5 class="mb-0">GitHub Integration</h5>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <div class="row g-4">
                    <div class="col-md-6">

    <script>
        function connectGitHub() {
            // Implement GitHub OAuth flow
            console.log('Connecting to GitHub...');
        }

        function connectGCP() {
            // Implement GCP authentication
            console.log('Connecting to Google Cloud...');
        }

        function connectAI(service) {
            // Show settings for the specific AI service
            const settingsDiv = document.querySelector(`[data-service="${service}"] .api-settings`);
            if (settingsDiv) {
                settingsDiv.classList.remove('d-none');
            }
            console.log(`Connecting to ${service}...`);
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>

<body>
    <div class="section-content">
        <h4 class="mb-4">Launch Your Tribe</h4>
        <p class="text-muted">Final checks and deployment of your tribe</p>

        <!-- Launch Checklist -->
        <div class="card mb-4">
            <div class="card-header d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center">

                                <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" checked disabled>

                            </div>
                            <span class="badge bg-success ms-auto">Complete</span>
                        </div>

                            <div class="form-check">
                                <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" disabled>
                                <label class="form-check-label">Smart Contract Audit</label>
